posts.title: About
posts.text: Welcom to my website!I am an associate researcher at the Research Center for Intelligent Computing Systems, Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences. I received my bachelor’s degree and PH.D. from Tsinghua University in 2014 and 2019 (advised by Professor Xiaowei Cui). Areas of research interests/research projects Integrated Navigation System for Autonomous Robots. Multi-sensor Fusion, including camera, LiDAR, Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS), Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU), etc. Positioning, Decision-making, and Path Planning for Autonomous Driving. Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM) based on cameras and LiDARs. Planning and Control of Field Robots. Key Technologies of Autonomous Navigation for Deep-Space Exploration rover. GNSS RTK technology in urban environments.
